settings.editor: AutoKonek by GoldCode transforms the traditional LTO registration into a smooth, digital-first experience.
Get your vehicle registered within days, not weeks.
From document collection to plate release.
Submit, track, and pay online—no paperwork hassle.
Handle bulk registrations efficiently with minimal effort.

AutoKonek is a smart digital service by GoldCode that streamlines the entire motor vehicle registration process—from document collection to plate release—making it faster, easier, and stress-free for both dealers and individual clients.
To become the leading digital platform for motor vehicle registration in the Philippines—trusted for its speed, simplicity, and reliability.

To deliver a seamless, end-to-end LTO registration experience through innovative technology and dedicated service, empowering clients and dealers to save time, reduce hassle, and stay compliant with ease.

settings.sg_title_after: Designed For Fast and Easy Registration

settings.editor: AutoKonek offers a full range of registration services tailored for today’s motorists—whether you’re driving a car, leasing a fleet, or adding a personal touch to your plate. Simple, secure, and all handled for you.
Seamless processing for all vehicle types—motorcycles, cars, trucks, and more. We handle the paperwork so you don’t have to.
Effortless solutions for privately-owned and leased vehicles, tailored to suit individual or fleet needs.
Make your vehicle stand out with a personalized LTO vanity plate. We’ll take care of the customization request for you.
From document collection to plate release, AutoKonek takes the stress out of registration—giving you a fast, smooth, and hassle-free experience every step of the way.
We’ll help you collect and verify all the necessary paperwork to kickstart your registration.
Your details are securely submitted to the LTO system (LTMS or LTO-IT) for fast processing.
Pay your registration fees conveniently and securely through our online payment channels.
Sit back and relax—we’ll handle the release and delivery of your official documents and plates.
With AutoKonek, we envisioned a system where customers can sit back, relax, and let us handle everything.

settings.title: Waiting weeks for motor vehicle registration is frustrating.

settings.editor: AutoKonek cuts down the time it takes to register, delivering results faster than traditional methods.

settings.title: Clients often face delays and confusion due to poor updates.

settings.editor: We provide real-time updates and a clear process, keeping you informed every step of the way.

settings.title: Handling documents and paperwork can be overwhelming.

settings.editor: AutoKonek simplifies document submission and validation, ensuring an effortless experience.
